## Interactive Plot of *InsectSprays* Data Set

```{r, message = FALSE}
library(plotly)
x <- list(title = "Spray")
y <- list(title = "Insect Count")
plot_ly(InsectSprays, y = ~count, color = ~spray, type = "box") %>%
    layout(xaxis=x, yaxis=y)
```

## Code

```{r, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
library(plotly)
x <- list(title = "Spray")
```
